page.title: 03 Rockingham Castle.
page.content: Rockingham Castle is a very imposing building.Part of the castle dates back to the Normans.It is situated on the crest of a hill overlooking the Welland Valley.It has always been a family home and still is today,though it is open to the public for two afternoons a week. Today it is the centre of the vast Rockingham estates which is largely given over to Farming.Recently it has been the focal point of a B.B.C. seris set in the English Civil War.Its influence on the area has and still is very considerable.
